descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
- Single Player Strategy Shooter Game 

- English voice(Ai) and text output

- Mix of first-person perspective (shooter) and 3rd-person perspective (strategy).

- Orkana is RTS + Shooter and so is interesting for strategy and non-strategy players.

- 5 missions with many hours of gameplay.each mission represents a territory to conquer( 3 difficulty levels)

- 1 bonus map with upgrades of items such as approximation mines, explosive bow, etc. with adjustable opponent

- Fight side by side with your army , direct fire at you when attacking enemy buildings or clusters of tanks to protect your army.

- Simple basic RTS building game with base, houses, barracks, vehicle factory, tech buildings and units.... build tanks, soldiers, various vehicles and stand up to mutant orcs, enemy vehicles and creatures.

- As you level up, Orkana offers new units, new enemies, new buildings, new items in each mission.

- Mini-story that is advanced during the missions through clues while exploring the game world or the mission description.
